definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: They should play an active role in helping nuclear-armed states disarm. There are many ways for them to collaborate
sentences.chinese: 它們應發揮積極作用，幫助有核國家裁軍。

sentences.english: Several proposals call for every nuclear country to join in.
sentences.chinese: 有幾項建議號召每個核國家都加入進來。

sentences.english: Furthermore, possessors are the preferred targets for terrorism and theft.
sentences.chinese: 而且，有核國家是恐怖主義分子和盜竊者偏愛的目標。

sentences.english: Chinese Government undertakes non-use of nuclear weapons against non-nuclear countries .
sentences.chinese: 中國政府承諾不對無核國家使用核武器。

sentences.english: The Islamic Republic of Iran is determined to become the world's tenth nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和國決心要成爲世界上第十個有核國家。

sentences.english: The Chinese government undertakes non-use of nuclear weapons against nonnuclear countries.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府承諾不對無核國家使用核武器。

sentences.english: During this visit, will Premier Wen acknowledge India as a nuclear country?
sentences.chinese: 訪問期間，溫總理會不會承認印度的核國家地位？

sentences.english: The margin of the superpowers over non-nuclear states had been widening .
sentences.chinese: 超級大國和非核國家之間的差距逐漸擴大了。

sentences.english: The non-nuclear weapon states also have a responsibility to work to prevent further proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 無核國家也有責任爲防止進一步的擴散而進行努力。

sentences.english: By all accounts, India has been a responsible nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 大家一致認爲，印度已是一個負責任的有核國家。
